onyomiExamples.meaning: Saturday, earth, dirt, soil, land, lands, ground, earth (third of the five elements)
plot of land, lot, soil, locality, region, place
pure land (esp. the Western Pure Land paradise of Amitabha), (Buddhist) paradise, Pure Land Buddhism
native place, birth-place, one's old home, province, region, locality
lower world, this world, the earth

kunyomiExamples.meaning: earth, soil, dirt, clay, mud, the earth (historically, esp. as opposed to the heavens), the ground, the land, low-quality torinoko-gami (containing mud), (period of) refraining from construction in the direction of the god of the earth (in Onmyōdō)
embankment (for road, railway, etc.), raising the ground level, fill
red clay, tuff loam, dark-red paint
